name: Remind (mantrasyn)
description:
Remind

Story adventure game, developed by 5 guys in a Course at BHT. 

Main aspect of the game:

- Low Poly Style

- Story

Playable in English or German!

Developers: 

- Jacob Raabe (OST, Mixing & Mastering)

- Andreas Katkov (SFX, 2d Artist)

- Christian Gach (Programmer, Voice Actor)

- Terry Waldow (Story writer, Voice Actor)

- Maurice Schembecker (3d Artist, Level Designer, Producer)
